SEARCH
Package com.example.ClassDiagram

Class Controller.LineConnection

java.lang.Object
com.example.ClassDiagram.Controller.LineConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing class:
Controller
public static class Controller.LineConnection extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a connection (e.g., line) between two class diagrams. Supports different connection types such as association, inheritance, aggregation, etc.
See Also:
